page.title: 14Steyning Religion
page.content: {The Church of England A church of wood was first built by St.Cuthman in 1047.The Norman arches of Steyning church are some of the finest examples of this period of building.A list of vicars dates from 1336,and the church wardens from 1516. {The Quaker Church The Quakers have their meeting (first begun 304 years ago)at Penns house near The Star Inn. William himself preached there once. {The Methodist Church The Methodist's have their 108 year old church in the High Street across the road from Springwells Hotel.
